titleStmt.title: Youths behaviour, or, Decency in conversation amongst men. Composed in French by grave persons for the use and benefit of their youth. Now newly turned into English by Francis Hawkins.
Youths behaviour, or, Decency in conversation amongst men. Composed in French by grave persons for the use and benefit of their youth. Now newly turned into English by Francis Hawkins.
titleStmt.author: Hawkins, Francis, 1628-1681.

editionStmt.edition: The fourth edition, with the addition of twenty sixe new precepts, (which are marked thus *)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Wilson for W. Lee; and are to be sold at the Turks-head neere the Miter Taverne in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproductions of the originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery (Early English Books), and the British Library (Thomason Tracts).
Appears in catalogue and on film as C.54.aa.1(1).
